systemError:
Oh My God, Bot has Found New Bug. Can you please try again after sometimes.
Or write %s, if this error will repeat. Sorry and thank you.
permissionDenied: Sorry <@%s>, you have no permission to execute `%s%s` command. You can ask the administrators for help.
unsupportedCommand: Sorry, we don't support `%s%s` command. You can ask administrators to add a new command to the bot.
configInfo:
<@%1$s> Using config command you can receive current config value of specified parameter `%2$sconfig (parameter)` or change it value `%2$sconfig (parameter) (new value)`. Be careful with this command :wink:

Parameters:
	**weight** 			- Weight of vote
	**minVp** 			- Minimum value of VP when bot will vote
	**minPostAge** - Minimum age of post to receive a vote
	**maxPostAge** - Maximum age of post to receive a vote
configParameterValueError: <@%s> Wrong new value of "%s" parameter. Errors: %s
configParameterValueChanged: <@%s> Value of "%s" parameter was changed successfully. New value: %s
